creator: rick.hicksted@qlogic.com
text:
Created attachment 32933
server.xml

Same Server.xml working on Tomcat 6.0.41 release.

IE just display the page can't be loaded.  Non-SSL works as expected.

Note 1:  on Windows 2012 R2 you need to update the system to the latest IE 11.0.21 for it to work.

Note 2:  using Tomcat 6.0.41 all IE version are functional (no updates required)

creator: rick.hicksted@qlogic.com
text: Windows 2012 only updates to IE 10.0.29 and is unable to update to IE 11.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum. You should use the users mailing list.

As SSL/TLS bugs are discovered defaults change and it is likely that your configuration worked with 6.0;.41 defaults but not with the 6.0.44 defaults.

You may also find https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/ useful.

creator: rick.hicksted@qlogic.com
text:
The same 6.0.44 config works with Chrome/FF/Safari/IE11.

How would this be a Tomcat config issue?

creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com
text:
(In reply to Rick Hicksted from comment #3)
> The same 6.0.44 config works with Chrome/FF/Safari/IE11.
> 
> How would this be a Tomcat config issue?

Again, this is a topic for the users mailing list.  Post your query there.
